summary: The BBC World Service is a global radio and online news broadcaster, reaching 450 million people weekly. It offers news and discussions in over 40 languages, with a goal of providing a balanced British perspective on world events. The service has expanded its languages recently, and its director, Jonathan Munro, leads the team, which also includes controller Jon Zilkha. With its "soft power" approach, the World Service aims to be respected internationally, competing with other state media outlets.
title: BBC World Service
